news.title: Mega Evolution Returns!
news.summary: The bond between Pokemon and Trainer reaches new heights in Lumiose City.

news.title: Lumiose City Redevelopment
news.summary: Urban planning underway for a coexistence of people and Pokemon.

pokemon.name: Zygarde
pokemon.description: When the Kalos region's ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.

pokemon.name: Xerneas
pokemon.description: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

pokemon.name: Yveltal
pokemon.description: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.description: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

pokemon.name: Lucario
pokemon.description: It controls waves known as auras, which are powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks.

pokemon.name: Greninja
pokemon.description: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

pokemon.name: Garchomp
pokemon.description: when it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

pokemon.name: Sylveon
pokemon.description: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
